description: MyHeritage is the leading destination for discovering, preserving and sharing family history. As technology thought leaders and innovators, MyHeritage is transforming family history into an activity that’s accessible and instantly rewarding. MyHeritage empowers families with an easy way to share their story, past and present, and treasure it for generations to come.
name: MyHeritage

description: AOL is an innovative media company which develops, grows and invests in brands and disruptive technology. AOL offers to consumers, publishers, and advertisers one integrated platform to plan, execute and optimize their marketing campaigns.
name: AOL

description: We’re a leading do-it-yourself platform for small businesses who want to create their own mobile app. There are a million Como-powered apps out there with 4,500 new ones every day. Check us out.
name: Como
